Indian name. In Indian, the name Pankaj means-lotus flower.The name Pankaj originated as an Indian name. The name Pankaj is most often used as a boy name or male name. Indian Name Meaning-lotus flower.

*To note: : It sometimes happens that two different first names have the same meaning. This has nothing surprising: both first names have the same figures of numerology. It is as in astrology: two persons belonging to the same sign present the same characteristic...

Pankaj is a male given name, common in Nepal and India to the Hindus. It has its roots in the Sanskrit word pankaj which means the lotus flower. The word is a samas, i.e. a grammatical union of two component words, paŋka (mud, pond) and jana/jāta (born, generated). The second component is commonly shortened in Sanskrit to give the suffix -ja.

It consists of 6 letters and 2 syllables and is pronounced Pan-kaj. In the U.S. in 2014 less than 5 boys given the name. Less than 5 girls were given the name. Pankaj falls into the flower name category.
Name Pankaj generally means Lotus flower or Mud born, is of Indian origin, Name Pankaj is a Masculine (or Boy) name. Person with name Pankaj are mainly Hindu by religion.
[ 2 syll. pan-kaj, pa-nk-aj ] The baby boy name Pankaj is pronounced as PaeNKaaJH †. Pankaj is of Sanskrit origin. Pankaj is a variant form of the name Padman.
